phrs.translation: 呼吸机, 通风设备, 呼吸器
肺呼吸器, 肺换气机, 医用肺通气机
医疗用人工呼吸器, 医用肺通气机

sentences.sentence: Normally these ventilators would be placed behind the helmet so it wouldn't face the brunt of the blast.
sentences.translation: 通常情况下，这些通风器会被放置在头盔后面，这样就不会面对爆炸的正面冲击。

sentences.sentence: Many state pandemic plans call for hospitals to remove patients from ventilators if they are not improving after two to five days.
sentences.translation: 一些州的防疫计划要求，如果病人在二到五天还没有康复迹象的话，就强制撤去呼吸器。

sentences.sentence: The ventilators cool down the radiators. In summer the noise is terrible. Right now there is no voltage here, works will start in autumn.
sentences.translation: 排气风扇冷却散热器，在夏天，噪音是可怕的，现在这里没有电压，工程将于秋天开始。
